thread.title: BRIEF-ConvergeOne Holdings Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.19

title: BRIEF-ConvergeOne Holdings Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.19
text:
Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-ConvergeOne Holdings Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.19 Reuters Staff
May 10 (Reuters) - ConvergeOne Holdings Inc:
* CONVERGEONE ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19
* Q1 REVENUE $306.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $297.7 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * REAFFIRMS FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.02, REVENUE VIEW $1.47 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
